title: There is a Cassiopeia bug
body: I just finished a game where I laned against a Cassiopia and all throughout the game her w was invisible when used. This mad the game extremely frustrating as when I walked over the normal map I was bombarded with her e and poisoned. It made me lose lane as I was playing yauso and was moving around the lane a lot with my e. Can you pls disable the champ and fix the bug as it will be detrimental to those facing this champion. The person I also versed commented on it just being em when my whole team couldn't see it making em believe that they were abusing the bug. So look into this a little please.

replies.body:
This is a problem based on what graphics card you use, and only seems to happen when the Cassiopeia is not sharing the exact same data with you ie. they're on the enemy team.

I had this too for a while. Hopefully it will just go away, like world hunger.

I've tested if it happened if different circumstances and after going through a few custom games it hasn't occurred again. It seems to make me think that its an issue with the ability with lag issues or something of the sort. -_-
